## Project Overview
A modern, content-driven portfolio website built with Next.js 14, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

## Technology Stack
- **Framework**: Next.js 14 (App Router)
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Content**: MDX + JSON
- **Deployment**: Vercel-ready

## Features Implemented
âœ… Server-side rendering with Next.js App Router
âœ… TypeScript for type safety
âœ… Tailwind CSS with dark mode toggle
âœ… MDX content for experience and projects
âœ… JSON-based content for education, skills, certificates
âœ… SEO optimization (metadata, OpenGraph, sitemap, robots.txt)
âœ… Fully responsive design
âœ… Tag-based filtering for experience/projects
âœ… Sample content based on resume

## Getting Started
```bash
npm run dev      # Start development server
npm run build    # Build for production
```

## Before Deploying
1. Add company logos to `/public/images/logos/`
2. Add project screenshots to `/public/images/projects/`
3. Replace `/public/cv.pdf` with your actual CV
4. Update personal information (email, LinkedIn, GitHub)
5. Customize colors in `tailwind.config.js`
